gen:link.msg:message: `LegalStatutoryReserves` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesLegalStatutoryReservesBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_LegalStatutoryReserves')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesLegalStatutoryReservesBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_LegalStatutoryReserves return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesLegalStatutoryReservesBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfLegalStatutoryReservesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesLegalStatutoryReservesBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfLegalStatutoryReservesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesLegalStatutoryReservesBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfLegalStatutoryReservesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesLegalStatutoryReservesBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfLegalStatutoryReservesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
